mapper.insert: insert into RoleInfo (RoleID, RecID, SysID, RoleName, Intro, Status, CreateTime, CreateUserID) values (#{roleID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update RoleInfo set RecID = #{recID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SysID = #{sysID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RoleName = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CreateUserID = #{createUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER} where RoleID = #{roleID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select RoleID, RecID, SysID, RoleName, Intro, Status, CreateTime, CreateUserID from RoleInfo where RoleID = #{roleID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select RoleID, RecID, SysID, RoleName, Intro, Status, CreateTime, CreateUserID from RoleInfo
